long_description: A new breed of light and versatile carry-on bag, the REI Stratocruiser 22 Wheeled Backpack comes with a full-featured removable daypack. Tubular aluminum frame combines with lightweight nylon fabric to keep overall weight low-just over 7 pounds. Removable daypack rides in a pocket that doubles as a stow pocket; compression straps snug the pocket to fit its contents; weight with daypack removed is cut to 5 lbs. 14 oz. Padded shoulder straps let you comfortably carry this luggage as a backpack; "leave behind" panel lets you detach the harness. When you want to travel ultralight by removing the daypack and harness, you reduce total weight down to just 5 lbs. The shoulder straps stow behind a zippered panel to create a clean exterior when checking as baggage. Daypack has a padded tablet-size sleeve and multiple pockets; long main zipper is designed to allow access when the daypack is worn over one shoulder. Telescoping pull handle locks in up/down position and has a soft grip; rugged wheels roll smoothly over a variety of surfaces. Bottom kickstand lets you park it upright; kickstand also doubles as a grab handle. Main pack's organization features include interior compression straps and mesh pockets, and an outer zip pocket . Exterior zippers on the Stratocruiser 22 Wheeled Luggage can be secured with standard travel locks, sold separately. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: A new breed of light and versatile carry-on bag, the REI Stratocruiser 22 Wheeled Backpack comes with a full-featured removable daypack.
